item.title: JaGeX copyrights
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Be like moparscape and put on the website that if u play runescape, are a member of jagex etc. they cant go on the site legally and see your server. Moparscape is like a blackmarket for rsps’ and they havent been sued because of their terms. You should be okay, as they rarely sue people (Suing a bot company took years)

Read full topic

item.title: JaGeX copyrights
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:9, topic:443348”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=546035.msg4003152#msg4003152 date=1338304541]
In theory the only thing that belongs to Fagex is the cache, if you were to model every single item, npc and map then they can’t do shit.
[/quote]

if your server is older then the Cryption and Stream class are also under copyright, the protocol between the server and client is also copyrighted by Jagex.[/quote]
summary: the whole client/cache/protocols/buffers/whatever is in the client is copyrighted to jagex

Read full topic

item.title: JaGeX copyrights
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

whattehp406:

In theory the only thing that belongs to Fagex is the cache, if you were to model every single item, npc and map then they can’t do shit.

if your server is older then the Cryption and Stream class are also under copyright, the protocol between the server and client is also copyrighted by Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: JaGeX copyrights
item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

[quote=“Quackie, post:1, topic:443348”]First of all im sorry if i posted this on the wrong section.

Basicly i want some information about what JaGeX does to Rsps’s and their owners.
I’ve heard that some people have been sued by JaGeX for alot of money, but also some popular servers has been up for years and there is no problem there.
I want to start a Rsps but i dont want to get sued (obv) so can i get past this? Should i be worried? I need some info here people.

//Quackie[/quote]

nothing happens…whoever told you that is a dumbass
